sql-select.name: GetTableInfo
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT DB_NAME() AS [DatabaseName] ,tSU.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[xtype] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[crdate] AS [ObjectCreatedDate] FROM [dbo].[sysobjects] tSO INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysusers] tSU ON tSU.[uid] = tSO.[uid] WHERE tSO.[id] = @ObjectId ORDER BY tSU.[name] ,tSO.[name] ;

SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT DB_NAME() AS [DatabaseName] ,tSS.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[type_desc] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[create_date] AS [ObjectCreatedDate] FROM [sys].[objects] tSO INNER JOIN [sys].[schemas] tSS ON tSS.[schema_id] = tSO.[schema_id] WHERE tSO.[object_id] = @ObjectId ORDER BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ;
